questions.question: Write pseudo-code to find the largest number in an array of integers.
Write pseudo-code to check if a string is a palindrome.
Write pseudo-code to calculate the factorial of a non-negative integer.
Write pseudo-code to sort an array of integers in ascending order.
Write pseudo-code to search for a specific element in a linked list.
Write pseudo-code to reverse a string.
Write pseudo-code to determine if a number is prime.
Write pseudo-code to find the greatest common divisor (GCD) of two integers.
Write pseudo-code to calculate the sum of all even numbers in an array.
Write pseudo-code to convert a decimal number to binary.
